main_definition: The main definition of 'santa' is a jolly, mythical figure who brings gifts to children around the world during Christmas.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A personification of Father Christmas or Saint Nicholas
meanings_and_examples.example: In many cultures, 'Santa' is a reference to the legendary figure who delivers presents to children on Christmas Eve.
'Santa' and 'St. Nick' are both informal terms used interchangeably with 'Father Christmas.'

meanings_and_examples.definition: The name of a department store in some countries
meanings_and_examples.example: 'Santa' is also the name of several prominent retail stores, such as Sears Canada and Hudson Bay Company.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A verb meaning to decorate or adorn something with holiday-themed items
meanings_and_examples.example: 'We decided to have a 'Santa' themed party for the Christmas season.'
